name: ShellShock (Skvader_418)
description:
Take control of a new artilery officer in the Secarmis Corporation. The goal of the corporation is to be number 1, but its not exactly possible to be number 1 in a nice way is it? Bomb outposts of rival corporations to help the secarmis corporation

DrTroniks Games https://tronik.itch.io/secustry

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Camera

Mouse -  Fire, Next Mission

R- Restart

1,2,3,4 - Select Bomb
